data.message:
Fuck this shit 
                                    sold out tickets with in minutes, man 
                looks like this kid ain't gonna get a chance to see or experience 
face to face one of his major influences to his mother fucking unharmful addiction that is           .          loud rap music, some people just don't understand what it means to us
the guys and girls to us are more than just musicians, we revolve around this music
                                                        this is like our religion, 
                                       and religiously we listen, to our favourites 
                              especially to help us through when times are tough
                            Man I eat sleep breath this stuff and still ain't enough 

                          I write my own lyrics try to freestyle to myself i practice 
                              bars lines rhymes not enough to fulfil my interest 
                              I turned to this more when I reached my deepest 
Darkest point of depression and everything just seemed to push me further to aggression
                                       Man I was heading for self destruction 
                        but that seemed to be the best place for self reconstruction

Now look at what I'm creating, can you see the instigation of what men like Eminem and Yela
                             Is tryin', to inspire and get kids like me to find it within
